Interface CNIUserRxProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CNICloudProvider<CNIUser>, CNIDataProvider<CNIUser>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CNIUserRxProviderImpl

    public interface CNIUserRxProvider
extends CNICloudProvider<CNIUser>
    User data provider interface
